title: Game-Based Social Learning Design: Blended Teaching Strategies Using Digital Games

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary social studies fundamentals and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based game learning program for in-service secondary social studies teachers aiming to improve history/geography pedagogy

learning_goals: Through game-based learning design, learners can present three or more strategies for utilizing digital games in the social studies curriculum context.
Learners can design educational game scenarios executable in mobile environments.
Learners can analyze game-play experiences and derive two or more formative assessment integration strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
